text: ( H ) HeLa cells ( 5 x 106 ) were transfected with p3xFLAG - <extra_id_0> Tat <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , or empty vector ( 10 microg ) and 48 h later ChIP was performed with anti-p65 antibody .

( I ) HeLa cells ( 5 x 106 ) were transfected with empty vector , or p3xFLAG - <extra_id_0> Tat <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( 10 microg ) in presence or absence of <extra_id_0> siRNA p65 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , or siRNA control ( 200 pmol ) ; 48 h later , ChIP was performed with anti-FLAG antibody .

( J ) HeLa cells ( 5 x 106 ) were transfected with empty vector , p3xFLAG - <extra_id_0> Tat <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( 10 microg ) , or empty vector plus <extra_id_0> siRNA IkappaB-alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> or siRNA control ( 200 pmol ) ; 48 h later , ChIP was performed with anti-IkappaB-alpha antibody .

Values ( mean +/- SE , n = 3 ) are shown .
The asterisks indicate statistically significant differences compared to the control ( empty vector ) according to the Student 's t-test ( P < 0.05 ) .
